actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing and directing the President to declare Valentyn Moroz an honorary citizen of the United States of America.

summary.text: Directs the President to declare Valentyn Moroz an honorary United States citizen. Declares it the sense of Congress that (1) the signatory nations should observe the principles of the Final Act of the Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe, and (2) the Soviet Union should permit Valentyn Moroz to accept an invitation by Harvard University.

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing and directing the President to declare Valentyn Moroz an honorary citizen of the United States of America.
